meanings.definition: Showy or overly elaborate in style
meanings.sent1: The chichi dress was covered in sparkles and sequins.
meanings.sent2: Her chichi hairstyle included intricate braids and colorful clips.
meanings.sent3: The chichi decorations at the party made everyone feel like royalty.
meanings.sent4: The chichi mansion stood out among the simple cottages in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent5: The chichi car gleamed with polished chrome and luxurious leather seats.

meanings.sent1: She put on a chichi accent when speaking to the guests.
meanings.sent2: His chichi behavior at the event annoyed everyone around him.
meanings.sent3: The chichi way he greeted people made them roll their eyes.
meanings.sent4: Her chichi attitude towards others made her seem unapproachable.
meanings.sent5: The chichi way he flaunted his wealth made others uncomfortable.

meanings.definition: Something considered fashionable or trendy, especially in a superficial or artificial way.
meanings.sent1: The magazine featured the latest chichi trends in fashion.
meanings.sent2: She always followed the chichi styles seen on social media.
meanings.sent3: The chichi accessory she wore clashed with her overall outfit.
meanings.sent4: The chichi of the moment was oversized sunglasses and tiny handbags.
meanings.sent5: Her room was filled with chichi items that looked good but served no real purpose.
